version.description: The version of the page schema

enabled.description: Whether the page is enabled or not. If disabled, this forces the page to not be deployed or interacted with.

route.description: The route of the page, used for navigation

content.description: The path to the content file for the page. This file should be located in the repository and contain the content of the page in Markdown or HTML format.

auth.description: Whether the page requires authentication to view. If true, only authenticated users can access the page.

draft.description: Whether the page is a draft or not. If true, this indicates that the page is still under development and not ready for public viewing.

format.description: The format of the page content. Can be either 'markdown' or 'html'. This determines how the content is rendered on the page.
